Blog.post: Nope i did not crash and burn but a teeny weeny accident happened and here it goes : In the morning i woke up i change quickly and when to school,when i arrived there i was 7 mins late! when i sat down the teacher called my name and asusal I wrote the BEST zho wen (chinese compo in class )heh heh :P THen later in the afternoon i when out wif my sister nope not shopping but erm... oh ya the liabrary and the maid agency .now this is the exiting part :p ok we were all in the car and when the car (my sis's car )was going stright boom...!crash! she bang into somebodies car but it is not her fault mean while in the car none of us was injured only me i had small injuries but no blood!and my cousin Francois was lucky he was holding a bag of 10 kg rice meaning it worked like an air bag ! heheh hee then i came to my sisters home and wrote this!
today i when to tuition as usual and need to study i was talking to my friend JOEI almost all the time.heh heh.o
this is an online journal where i tell you about my every day life ! ok mybe not every day
today i woke up so early and when shopping wif my cousin and bought nothing i'snt it LAME!!!! we when to a lot of places and even if i did not buy anything i still enjoy myself on vesak day 2004!
? i forgive liyana ,imean how can i be such a softee ! oh my gosh!guess what

LIAyaNA strikes once again .This time is "LIANA & GANG " today like any other days I went to the basket ball court to do my silent reading was about to seat on the floor .....Munirah&shinas (people of liyana's gang)were occupying my space!(liyana was not there)so they said I was "late".I had no choice but to seat at the back!asUsual liyana the gang leader came later then me and guess what she got to seat on her place ! She how bad she could be some times I mean all the time!

hey this is the story about an irrtating gril in my class. Today when i was doing my work all of the sudden she send me a paper msg saying ...'carmen are you my friend?pls circle yes or no '......guess what i circled... like duh the ans is no!guess what happened...just post a comment and by the end of this month i'll tell you what happened!

The school holidays....i did not even enjoy myself and got so much homework to do!!!the only thing i enjoyed is going swimming wif my cousins matthew,dao bing,pearlyn,marcusand my aunts and uncle!we when to jurong east BIG splash!we played the slide,merry-go-round,the wave thingy .so fun then we when to eat we ate chicken rice!!!THIS WAS HOW I SPEND MY SCHOOL HOLIDAYS
